channel.title: PaulBlog on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in PaulBlog on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Big List of Useful Commands
item.description: show run -> show running config show cdp nei detail -> show detailed list of CDP neighbors

item.title: IP Accounting
item.description: I got lost in the woods today. Two friends, a Meerkat and a Warthog, found me, sung a song with me and gave my life new meaning. Today was a good day.

item.title: Order of Operations
item.description: I tried to become a vegan today. I made it to lunch time and couldn’t bear the sight of another green leaf. Yuck!
